string-array.name: xbee_diagnostics_descriptions
string-array.item: Read-only parameter.\n\nRead modem firmware version number.
Read-only parameter.\n\nRead modem hardware version number.
Read-only parameter.\n\nRead Association status code to monitor association progress.
Read-only parameter.\n\nRead the RSSI of the last received packet or APS acknowledgment.

Read-only parameter.

Read the supply voltage of the module.
The %V measurement returns { 4 × (Vcc/4) } where (Vcc/4) is the measurement value from the 10-bit A/D read, and the (4×) multiple allows the application to use the same formula to convert %V into mV units as it would to convert any A/D reading to mV: mV = (%V) × (1200/1024). (1200mV is the A/D reference voltage.)
A %V response of 0x900 (2304 decimal) represents 2700mV, or 2.7V.
Read-only parameter.\n\nRead power compensation temperature sensor in units of Celsius degrees.
